creator: joerg.klein@ifsam.lu
text:
I installed 1.3.27 over 1.3.23.
In ver 1.3.23 I set the service to log on with a special user and password.
After I installed/updated ver 1.3.27 these settings were lost.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text: Right, simply reset the 'log on as user' for the new apache service.
